content.text1: The word compassion best encompasses our approach of pursuing relationships with people who are vulnerable, and we experience mutual transformation in the process. We recognize all people as unique individuals made in the image of God. Compassion requires a willingness to join people in their suffering and to walk alongside them in their journey.

content.header1: We work for justice in our neighbourhoods and around  the world
content.text1: We passionately care for people and want to ensure our actions don't cause more harm than good. That’s why education is our top priority. We stop to learn about the social issues of our time. We strive to make informed decisions before taking action. We partner with the marginalized, relying on their own experience and understanding of their needs to ensure we are taking action that results in welcome change. We expect the journey to change us as we engage in changing the world for the better.
